{"id":1811796331,"question_id":4083,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1761448317,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"598 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1811796331/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Stable Subarrays With Equal Boundary and Interior Sum","memory":"79.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def countStableSubarrays(self, capacity: List[int]) -> int:\n        N = len(capacity)\n\n        pref = 0\n        ans = 0\n\n        m = defaultdict(lambda: [])\n        for i in range(N):\n            l = m[(capacity[i], pref - 2*capacity[i])]\n            cnt = 0\n\n            for j in range(len(l)-1, -1, -1):\n                if i+1 - l[j] >= 3:\n                    break;\n                cnt += 1\n            ans += len(l) - cnt;\n\n            m[(capacity[i], pref)].append(i)\n            pref += capacity[i]\n\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"stable-subarrays-with-equal-boundary-and-interior-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1292}
